actions.description: Grants permission to update an Amazon Chime SIP media application call under the administrator's AWS account

actions.name: UpdateSipRule
actions.description: Grants permission to update properties of Amazon Chime SIP rule under the administrator's AWS account

actions.name: UpdateSupportedLicenses
actions.description: Grants permission to update the supported license tiers available for users in your Amazon Chime account

actions.name: UpdateUser
actions.description: Grants permission to update user details for a specified user ID

actions.name: UpdateUserLicenses
actions.description: Grants permission to update the licenses for your Amazon Chime users

actions.name: UpdateUserSettings
actions.description: Grants permission to update user settings related to the specified Amazon Chime user

actions.name: UpdateVoiceConnector
actions.description: Grants permission to update Amazon Chime Voice Connector details for the specified Amazon Chime Voice Connector

actions.name: UpdateVoiceConnectorGroup
actions.description: Grants permission to update Amazon Chime Voice Connector Group details for the specified Amazon Chime Voice Connector Group

actions.name: ValidateAccountResource
actions.description: Grants permission to validate the account resource in your Amazon Chime account

actions.name: ValidateE911Address
actions.description: Grants permission to validate an address to be used for 911 calls made with Amazon Chime Voice Connectors
